sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_sql_trace (sessionid, uri, ip, user_agent, adminid, userid, cookie, ibatis_key, ibatis_param, sql, bind_param, bind_type, regist_date) VALUES(#sessionid#, #uri#, #ip#, #user_agent#, #adminid#, #userid#, #cookie#, #ibatis_key#, #ibatis_param#, #sql#, #bind_param#, #bind_type#, SYSDATE)
